title: Source Code & Secrets
text: Secrets (passwords, API keys, certificates, tokens, API keys like sk_live_xxx) must never be shared with external tools or copied into public channels.

title: PII Handling
text: Email IDs, phone numbers and other personally identifiable information (PII) of employees or customers must be redacted or anonymized before sharing with external services.

title: Financial Data Confidentiality
text: Internal revenue figures, transaction volumes, pricing models and other financial data must not be shared with third-party AI tools without prior approval from the finance and security team.
